alert.note: Alert for Auglaize; Darke; Mercer; Shelby (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 5:20PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN SHELBY, NORTHEASTERN DARKE, WESTERN AUGLAIZE AND SOUTHEASTERN MERCER COUNTIES THROUGH 545 PM EDT... At 520 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over St. Henry, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Sidney, Celina, Wapakoneta, St. Marys, Coldwater, New Bremen, Minster, St. Henry, Newport, Anna, Fort Loramie, Botkins, New Knoxville, Moulton, Osgood, Chickasaw, Burkettsville, North Star, Rossburg and Kettlersville. This includes I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 93 and 116. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for west central Ohio. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
